channel.title: Intelligent Debates/Discussion badge?
channel.description:
I came across this comment on the MoparScape badges thread;
[quote="Bowser jr, post:54, topic:469775"]Too bad we haven't a General/Intellectual Debates/Discussion badge.[/quote]
and noticed we don't have many badges, aside from the programming based ones. I do believe we need a new badge, such as this, so the intelligent members of the community can be recognized/noticed, and this is one way to ensure recognition.
So, i'm eager to hear your opinions on this matter. Before you comment, here are a few things you could think about:
[ul][li]What would the requirements be[/li] [li]Who would deserve this badge (as of right now)[/li] [li]Pro's and Con's[/li][/ul]
Discuss.

item.title: Intelligent Debates/Discussion badge?
item.dc:creator: @Phaze_One Fuscate
item.description:
@Phaze_One wrote:

Skyro:

You make so many of these, it’s really annoying I think. I mean, it’s good your active in the community but every little thing doesn’t need to be discussed and debated really annoying.

so.much.hypocrisy.

Read full topic

item.title: Intelligent Debates/Discussion badge?
item.dc:creator: @Uncalled Uncalled
item.description:
@Uncalled wrote:

[quote=“Bowser jr, post:49, topic:470510”][quote author=Uncalled link=topic=587993.msg4173346#msg4173346 date=1354657411]

[quote author=gravenfire23 link=topic=587993.msg4173311#msg4173311 date=1354652212]

i think otherwise

I’m retracting your statement for your own safety.

:mad:

We could always take him for living in warm Florida, while we are freezing with -7[sup]o[/sup] C to -8[sup]o[/sup] C here in Northern Europe.
[/quote]What are you talking about its freezing down here in florida
[/quote]NOT IN TEXAS

http://www.yr.no/sted/USA/Texas/
http://www.yr.no/sted/USA/Florida/

It is warmer in Florida.[/quote]Oh damn. Either way, still warmer here than what you have. The only downside [although it’s a major downside] is that I have to live in America.

Read full topic

item.title: Intelligent Debates/Discussion badge?
item.dc:creator: @rip4d rip4d
item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

I say we make a Mewtwo badge and give it to someone, making them feel special when in reality it means nothing.

Or give it to intelligent people in the community, although all that would do is spark a wave of posts of people acting smart rather than being smart, and then there would be a sense of elitism surrounding that badge.

Just my pointless suggestion of the day.

Read full topic
